content: remain p2 k1 repeat row 1 and 2 a total of 10 11 12 13 sizes m and xl p1 *k2 p2* repeat * - * until times i e for a total of 20 22 24 26 row in 3 sts remain k2 p1 the heel flap or until the heel flap is of desired length and you have just finished row work the ribbing as described above for 8 10 2 after finishing chart a row 30 please 10 12 rnds or to desired ribbing length repeat row 1-8 only i e do not start cables at the end of the heel flap leg left sock k9 k11 k13 k15 work chart a and knit to the end of the round work chart a row 1-30 starting at the beginning of needle 2 work once and then work row 1-16 once more the heel flap as follows should you prefer a shorter leg omit some or all the chart a row 1-8 row 1 rs on the first row p1 and on following odd row sl1 then work chart a left sock only work the sts on needle 1 once sts 15-26 and knit to the end of the needle more turn row 2 ws sl1 p8 p10 p12 p14 and work chart a sts 26-14 i e read the chart from left heel flap to right turn the heel flap is worked over the 22 24 26 repeat row 1 and 2 a total of 10 11 12 13 28 sts on needle 1 in the right sock and over times or as many times as in the right sock the 22 24 26 28 sts on needle 2 in the left after finishing chart a row 30 please repeat sock as instructed separately for each sock row 1-8 only i e do not start cables at the please note that the chart is read from right to end of the heel flap left on the rs and from left to right on the ws merenkulkija socks page 2/5 heel turn work the round heel turn in right and left work the instep sts as established in the leg sock as follows work the gusset decreases in the sole side as row 1 rs sl1 k12 k13 k14 k15 ssk k1 follows turn round 1 k1 ssk knit until 3 sts remain k2tog row 2 ws sl1 p5 p2tog p1 turn k1 row 3 rs sl1 knit until 1 st remains before round 2 knit the gap ssk k1 turn repeat round 1 and round 2 until 22 24 26 28 sts row 4 ws sl1 purl until 1 st remains before remain in the sole the gap p2tog p1 turn work the instep sts as established in the leg repeat row 3 and 4 until all side stitches and knit the sole sts until foot measures have been worked and you have just finished approximately 3 5 4 4 4 5 cm / 1½ 1⅝ 1⅝
